review: The fire stick is great at having access to many apps and prime, but it freezes for a second or two at a time. It also seems to have problems buffering, as usually watching shows there are second or two freezes then it catches up to itself. i have also had it lose all the information stored on the stick and had to re login to all my accounts. Im ready to switch back to my PS3.
author: Tom

review: Terrible ! Just plugged mine in and was excited to get started with it... it takes literally forever to load ANYTHING.  I can barely get through the getting started video, it says the connection is strong as it should be being 1 foot away from the router. This must be detective?  Completely unusable
author: Kathryn

review: Love this thing. The wife and I use it in the bedroom to watch Netflix and occasionally Amazon Prime Video. I have a Chromecast and Roku Box - this is like have the best of both in one tiny stick.Would definitely recommend.
